fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check flow NTC sensor. Check wiring. Check PCB connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check return NTC sensor. Check wiring. Check PCB connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check flow NTC sensor. Check wiring for damage. Check PCB.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check pump operation. Check system circulation. Check safety temp limiter and connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Allow system to cool before handling components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check system pressure. Re-pressurize system. Check for leaks. Check pressure sensor.

fault_codes.description: Water deficiency (temp difference flow/return too high)
fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check pump operation. Check for blockages. Check flow and return NTC sensors.

fault_codes.description: Water deficiency (temp rise flow too rapid)
fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check pump operation. Check for blockages. Check system pressure.
Check flame sensing electrode. Check moisture on PCB. Check PCB.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check gas supply. Check ignition electrode and lead. Check flue system. Check gas valve. Check PCB.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure gas supply is turned off before checking gas components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check gas supply. Check flue system. Check flame sensing electrode. Check PCB.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure gas supply is turned off before checking gas components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check fan electrical connection. Check PCB. Check fan for blockage or damage.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.description: Flue gas or air inlet issue
fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check entire flue system. Check air inlet. Check sensor.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure flue system is properly installed to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning.
